⚸ kll | khr 𓆼 Ϧ x 𓐍 𓆼 𓄿 … kraus, curly, kräuseln!

𓆼 󳼛 󳾵 󳾶 󳾷 󳾸 󳾹 󳾺 󳾻 󳾼 󳾽 󳼚 󳿀 󳾾 󳾿 󳿁 󳿂 󳿃 󳿄 󳿅 󳿆 󳿇 󳿈 󳿉 󳿊 𓇓 𓍱 𓍶 sh ç ć č cent 𓏲

󳼙 󳼜 󳼝 󳼞 󳼟 󳼠 󳼡 󳼢 󳼣

𓆼 ⇨ ⇨ Ϧ

𓆼 ≈ 𒉣𒋡 ≈ 𒊺𒋡 kilo 𒋡 K in Proto-Cuneiform! 𓆼 ≈ 𒆰 KUL

  • 𓆼 = 1000
  • 𓆼 = 𓊃𓈙𓈖𓆸 = zusan / sosan = lily in Persia
  • 𓆼 sosan ⋍ thousand 1000 ⋍ ϣⲟϣⲟ
  • 𓆼 lily = calla ⋍ kilo 1000 χίλιοι
  • 𓆼 kalla ⋍ 𓎡 כל 𓎟 = all > 1000
  • 𓆼 lily = 百合 bǎihé ⋍ 100*10 = 1000 (什 shén = 10)
  • 𓆼 kamille camomile chamomile, semantic sic => mille=1000 mili⇔līmi@Akkad
  • 𓆼 TauSon mirrored SonTau (sundew)
  • 𓆼 lily symbol for לילה Laila ليل leylun = night 𓏲𓄿𓆼𓇰
  • 𓆼 ⇔ 𓄿𓆼 ⲁ alpha = 1000 in semitic

𓆼 joke?

𒊹 ŠAR₂ ǦEOR Kerbe 3.6 Kilo 3600

𓆼 kilo <> ☾↓𓏏 Keil (schrift) <> dent 𓆼 kilo <> mille <> ☾↓𓏏 moon menge 𓏠 ⲙⲏϣ <> 𓄉𓄊𓄈𓏛 ? 𓆼 mille vs million 𓁨 𒊹𒃲 𒄶 𒊹𒌋

𓋴 𓆼 𓀁 זְכַרְיָה zəḵaryā זכר "remebered" 𓋴 𓇋 𓎛 𓃶 saḫa sacret "good" <> scribe script

One-word-reading slightly different from root κρίνον(calla) ⇔ 𓆼 χ khr

𓆼 𓄿 𓐍 𓂝||spear (fish)| greco ⇔ Ger!

Lily is used in the Old Testament to translate Hebrew šošanna, a term derived from Susa, Persian Šuš, the city in southwest Iran that was the ancient capital of the Elamite kingdom and Achaemenid empire. 𓊃𓈙𓈖𓆸 Susa 1000

Second reading: 𓆼 = Tau𓍢 1.000
